com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection

Interface IAndroidBluetoothConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBluetoothConnection

    public interface IAndroidBluetoothConnection
    Android bluetooth connection interface, if need to create a android bluetooth connection, need implementation the interface.

    Author:
    Jay Lee

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(BluetoothDevice device)
      Start a connection to a remote device.
      void disconnect()
      close local android bluetooth connection, but the meter still in PCL mode.
      void listen()
      wait for a connect request from meter.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(BluetoothDevice device)
        Start a connection to a remote device. (Type I)
        Parameters:
        device - The BluetoothDevice to connect

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        close local android bluetooth connection, but the meter still in PCL mode.

        if want to power off meter, must call AbstractMeter.turnOffMeterOrBluetooth(int)

        call the method, only stop the local device(android phone) connection, not turn off local android bluetooth adapter.

      • listen

        void listen()
        wait for a connect request from meter. (Type II)
